FunCricket Home About Us How to Start FAQ'S Coments Download App Welcome to the thrilling realm of fantasy sports - FunCricket invites you to embark on an exhilarating journey where your cricketing expertise meets strategic prowess. Get ready to experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat as you immerse yourself in the captivating world of FunCricket. Enter your telephone I accept this - Privacy Policy Get App Link SUPPORT All Time Support See More SAFETY 100% Secure See More DOWNLOADS 100,000+ Downloads See More RATING 4.91 / 5 From 100,000+ Users See More What is the FunCricket app? It's FunCricket app your gateway to an exhilarating cricket experience! Dive into the immersive world of cricket fantasy gaming where you can assemble your dream team, strategize your game plan, and compete against friends or other cricket enthusiasts. With real-time player statistics and match updates, the FanSports app brings the excitement of live cricket action right to your fingertips. Whether you're a seasoned cricket fan or just getting started, FanSports offers an engaging platform to showcase your cricket knowledge and skills. Download the app now and embark on your cricket fantasy journey! Download App HOW TO START USING APP? With these simple steps, you're all set to dive into the exciting world of fantasy cricket with the FunCricket app! STEP 1 Download the App: Begin by downloading the FunCricket app from the Google Play Store or the Apple App Store on your mobile device. It's available for both iOS and Android platforms. STEP 2 Sign Up: Once the app is installed, open it and sign up for an account. You can register using your email address, phone number, or social media accounts. STEP 3 Create Your Team: After signing up, you'll be directed to create your fantasy cricket team. Choose players from upcoming matches based on their performance statistics, skills, and your strategic insights. STEP 4 Join Contests: Explore the various contests available on the platform and join the ones that interest you. There are different types of contests with varying entry fees and prize pools. STEP 5 Set Your Lineup: Before the match begins, set your lineup by selecting your playing XI and assigning captain and vice-captain roles. Your chosen players will earn points based on their performance during the actual match. STEP 6 Follow the Action: Once your lineup is set, sit back and enjoy the live cricket action. Track your team's performance in real-time within the app, monitor player statistics, and climb up the leaderboard as you compete against other users. FAQ'S How do I create my fantasy cricket team on FunCricket? To create your fantasy cricket team on FunCricket, you first need to sign up or log in to your account. Once logged in, navigate to the "Create Team" section where you can select players from the upcoming matches within your budget. Choose your team composition wisely, including batsmen, bowlers, all-rounders, and a wicketkeeper, and then save your team. What are the different types of contests available on FunCricket? FunCricket offers various types of contests to cater to different preferences and skill levels. These include Head-to-Head contests, where you compete against another player, Multiplayer contests with multiple participants, and Guaranteed Prize Pool contests with fixed prize amounts. How are points calculated for players in FunCricket contests? Points in FunCricket contests are calculated based on the performance of players during the actual matches. Points are awarded for actions like runs scored, wickets taken, catches, stumpings, and more. Each action carries a predefined point value, and the cumulative points of all players in your fantasy team determine your score. Can I change my lineup after the match has started? No, you cannot change your lineup once the match has started in FunCricket. Once the match begins, the lineup you have chosen is locked in, and you cannot make any changes to it until the next match. What happens if a match is canceled or abandoned? If a match is canceled or abandoned due to unforeseen circumstances such as bad weather, pitch conditions, or any other reasons, FunCricket follows predefined rules to handle such situations. Usually, in such cases, the contest is considered void, and entry fees are refunded to participants. How can I withdraw my winnings from FunCricket? To withdraw your winnings from FunCricket, you need to navigate to the "My Account" or "Wallet" section of the app. From there, select the withdrawal option and follow the provided instructions to initiate the withdrawal process. You may be required to provide additional details for verification purposes before the withdrawal is processed. Once approved, your winnings will be transferred to your chosen withdrawal method. Get FunCricket now and embark on your adventure into the realm of fantasy sports! With FunCricket, you can create your own fantasy cricket team composed of real-life players from various teams and leagues. Strategically assemble your lineup, considering factors like player performance, form, and match conditions, to maximize your chances of success. Once your team is set, you can enter a variety of contests available on the app, ranging from head-to-head matchups to larger tournaments with big prizes at stake. Compete against other users, test your skills, and climb the leaderboard as you strive for glory. Points are awarded based on the performance of your selected players in real matches. Keep track of live scores and player statistics to see how your team is performing and make adjustments as needed to stay ahead of the competition. Whether you're a seasoned cricket enthusiast or new to the sport, FunCricket offers an engaging and immersive experience for fans of all levels. Download the app now and start your journey into the captivating world of fantasy sports! FunCricket Home About Us How to Start FAQ'S Coments Download App Privacy Policy for FunCricket App This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Introduction: Welcome to FunCricket App's Privacy Policy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our app. Scope of Policy: This policy applies to all users of FunCricket App, including visitors, registered users, and subscribers. Information We Collect: We collect information such as your name, email address, and device information to provide you with personalized experiences and improve our services. Use of Cookies: FunCricket App uses cookies to enhance your user experience and analyze site traffic. You can adjust your cookie settings in your browser preferences. Information Usage: We use the information we collect to customize your app experience, provide customer support, and communicate with you about our services. Data Sharing: We do not share your personal information with third parties unless required by law or to provide you with requested services. Third-Party Links: FunCricket App may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. Children's Privacy: FunCricket App is not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. Your Rights: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of certain communications. Changes to Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of the app signifies your acceptance of the revised policy. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at www.funcrictet.com. Accountability: We are committed to ensuring compliance with this Privacy Policy and applicable privacy laws. Compliance with Laws: FunCricket App complies with all relevant data protection laws and regulations. User Responsibilities: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and password. Data Retention: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. International Data Transfers: Your information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside of your country. Policy Application: This Privacy Policy applies solely to information collected by FunCricket App. Acceptance of Terms: By using FunCricket App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Effective Date: This Privacy Policy Governing Law: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws Severability Clause: If any provision of this Privacy Policy is deemed invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will still be valid and enforceable. Limitation of Liability: FunCricket App shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of our app or the information contained therein. Disclaimer of Warranties: We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of the information provided on FunCricket App. Waiver of Rights: Our failure to enforce any provision of this Privacy Policy shall not constitute a waiver of such provision or any other provision. Entire Agreement: This Privacy Policy constitutes the entire agreement between you and FunCricket App regarding the collection and use of your personal information. Notification Procedures: Any notices or communications regarding this Privacy Policy will be sent to you via email or through the app. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy. By using the FunCricket app, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this Privacy Policy. We value your privacy and trust, and we are committed to ensuring the security and confidentiality of your personal information. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this exciting game today!
